name: src/datapoint.js
Datapoint
description: Datapoints contain any type of data produced by an action.

name: constructor
description: Datapoints contain any type of data produced by an action.

params.name: type
params.description: What kind of Datapoint is this?

params.name: format
params.description: What type of value does this Datapoint store? ('string' or 'number')

name: body
description: Declare empty JSON as body to store values

name: data
description: The data stored in a Datapoint.

name: format
description: The data type for the Datapoint's value.

name: type
description: The type of Datapoint.

name: content
description: The content of the Datapoint.

name: parent
description: The parent of this Datapoint.

name: permissions
description: Permissions associated with this Datapoint.

name: setType
description: Set the type of the Datapoint.

params.name: type
params.description: What kind of Datapoint is this?

name: setFormat
description: Set the format of the Datapoint.

params.name: format
params.description: What type of value does this Datapoint hold?

name: setContent
description: Set the content of a datapoint.

params.name: content
params.description: The value of the Datapoint. If object, must have 'value' field.

name: setParent
description: Set the parent field.

name: setCustomPermissions
description: Set custom permissions.

params.name: override
params.description: Set as true to override existing permissions.

name: setPermissions
description: Assign permissions using standard format: GET, PUT, and DELETE.

params.name: perms
params.description: Permissions JSON. Must have GET, PUT, or DELETE fields.

params.name: override
params.description: Set as true to override existing permissions

name: addPermission
description: Add a new permission.

name: generate
description: Check for missing fields and generate a JSON object of the datapoint.

name: toString
description: Convert the datapoint to a string.

unknown.tagValue: {string} string representation of this Datapoint's data

return.description: string representation of this Datapoint's data

name: src/task_output.js
TaskOutput
description: TaskOutput collects datapoints, notifications, and assignments into one object.

name: constructor
description: TaskOutput collects datapoints, notifications, and assignments into one object.

name: datapoints
description: Store Datapoints in an array.

name: notifications
description: Store Notifications in an array.

name: assignments
description: Store assignments in an array.

name: addDatapoint
description: Add a datapoint

name: addNotification
description: Add a notification to the task output.

name: addAssignment
description: Add an assignment to the task output.

name: generate
description:
Generate an object collecting datapoints, notifications, and assignments.
For any datapoints, validate it's fields and generate a JSON.

name: toString
description: Convert the task output to a string.

unknown.tagValue: {string} string representation of this TaskOutput object's data.

return.description: string representation of this TaskOutput object's data.

content:
# task-helper

The `task-helper` library helps format webtask output.

- **Manual**: Learn how to use Datapoints and TaskOutput data types with example code.
- **Reference**: Documentation for classes.
- **Source**: Source code for classes.
name: ./README.md
package.json
./manuals/manual_dp.md
./manuals/manual_to.md
